text:
It took decades for the NBA to realize it should be taking more of the shots that are literally worth one more point.
But once NBA teams began to embrace 3-pointers, the game changed forever. They slowly migrated away from the basket and behind the 3-point line as the percentage of field-goal attempts that were 3-pointers increased almost every season.
